chapter.title: Paket org.­dbdoclet.­doclet
chapter.para: The package doclet contains the following classes:
The package doclet contains the following subpackages:

sect2.title: getImageFormat()getImageFormatMethodsgetImageFormat
sect2.para: Liefert das Format des zuletzt erzeugten Klassendiagramms.

sect2.title: getImageHeight()getImageHeightMethodsgetImageHeight
sect2.para: Liefert die Höhe des zuletzt erzeugten Klassendiagramms.

sect2.title: getImageWidth()getImageWidthMethodsgetImageWidth
sect2.para: Liefert die Breite des zuletzt erzeugten Klassendiagramms.

sect1.title: Klasse DocletOptions
sect1.para: The class Options provides access methods for the properties defined in the properties file.

listitem.para: The destination file, *e.g. Reference.sgml. Any images are copied into the subdirectory figures of the same directory.

sect2.title: Syntax
sect2.para: Direkt abgeleitete Klassen: org.­dbdoclet.­doclet.­DbdOptions

sect2.title: DocletOptions(OptionList, ResourceBundle)DocletOptionsMethodsDocletOptions
sect2.para: Creates a new DocletOptions instance.

sect2.title: DocletOptions(ResourceBundle)DocletOptionsMethodsDocletOptions
sect2.para: Creates a new DocletOptions instance.

sect1.title: Klasse TagManager
sect1.para: The class TagManager is reponsible for handling the javadoc tags. It also handles tags, which are defined on the command line with the -tag option.

sect2.title: createTagMap(TreeMap<String, TreeMap<String, ClassDoc>>, DocletOptions)createTagMapMethodscreateTagMap
sect2.para: The method createTagMap creates a tag map for tags, which are defined on the command line via the -tag option.

sect2.title: handleInlineTag(Tag)handleInlineTagMethodshandleInlineTag
sect2.para: The method handleTag handles a single tag.

sect1.title: Klasse DitaDoclet
sect1.para: The class DocBookDoclet implements a doclet, which creates a 1 * DocBook XML file from the javadoc information. It also creates an XML document with the information about the classes, fields and methods found. This document is used to create an XMI file for use with an UML modelling tool.

sect2.title: start(RootDoc)startMethodsstart
sect2.para: The method start is called from within the Doclet API. It is the main entry point of the doclet. This method catches all Exceptions and prints a stacktrace if necessary.

chapter.title: Paket org.­dbdoclet.­doclet.­docbook
chapter.para: The package contains the following classes:

sect1.title: Klasse DbdTransformer
sect1.para: The class DbdTransformer transforms the information created by the javadoc tool to DocBook trees.

sect2.title: transform(Doc, DocBookElement, DbdContext)transformMethodstransform
sect2.para: The method transform transforms the documentation of java language constructs (class, package, method, ...), which are represented by a Doc object.

sect2.title: transform(String, DocBookElement, DbdContext)transformMethodstransform
sect2.para: The method transform transforms the content of a String buffer into a DocBook tree.

sect2.title: transform(String, DocBookElement, DbdContext, HtmlElement)transformMethodstransform
sect2.para: The method transform transforms the content of a String buffer into a DocBook tree.

entry.para: skip all lines until the the tag skipTo is found.

sect2.title: transform(Tag[], DocBookElement, DbdContext)transformMethodstransform
sect2.para: The method transform transforms the documentation of an array of javadoc tag.

sect2.title: transform(Tag, DocBookElement, DbdContext)transformMethodstransform
sect2.para: The method transform transforms the documentation of a javadoc tag.

sect1.title: Klasse DocBookDoclet
sect1.para: The class DocBookDoclet implements a doclet, which creates a 1 * DocBook XML file from the javadoc information. It also creates an XML document with the information about the classes, fields and methods found. This document is used to create an XMI file for use with an UML modelling tool.

sect2.title: start(RootDoc)startMethodsstart
sect2.para: The method start is called from within the Doclet API. It is the main entry point of the doclet. This method catches all Exceptions and prints a stacktrace if necessary.

sect1.title: Klasse StyleCoded
sect1.para: The class StyleCoded is the super class for the coded styles.

sect2.title: Syntax
sect2.para: Direkt abgeleitete Klassen: org.­dbdoclet.­doclet.­docbook.­StyleTableorg.­dbdoclet.­doclet.­docbook.­StyleVariableList

sect1.title: Klasse StyleTable
sect1.para: The class StyleNoTables provides a layout without any tables. There could be tables in the comments of cours!e, but the style will not generate any tables by itself.

sect2.title: addParamInfo(ExecutableMemberDoc, DocBookElement, DbdContext)addParamInfoMethodsaddParamInfo
sect2.para: Spezifiziert durch: Methode addParamInfo in der Schnittstelle Style
The method addParamInfo adds a list containing all parameter tags with their comments.

sect1.title: Klasse StyleVariableList
sect1.para: The class StyleNoTables provides a layout without any tables. There could be tables in the comments of cours!e, but the style will not generate any tables by itself.

sect2.title: addParamInfo(ExecutableMemberDoc, DocBookElement, DbdContext)addParamInfoMethodsaddParamInfo
sect2.para: Spezifiziert durch: Methode addParamInfo in der Schnittstelle Style
The method addParamInfo adds a list containing all parameter tags with their comments.

sect1.title: Klasse PackageServices
sect1.para: The class PackageServices provides some static methods for dealing with packages.

sect2.title: findPackageDirectory(PackageDoc, String)findPackageDirectoryMethodsfindPackageDirectory
sect2.para: The findPackageDirectory method returns the absolute path of a package. Therefore all entries in the sourcepath are scanned. If the package can not be found null is returned.

section.title: Die besten Zehn - Direkt abgeleitete Klassen
